item.description: Enjoy some of Motown’s favorites. Chiffons: “He’s So Fine,””One Fine Day,” “Sweet Talkin Guy,” “My Boyfriend’s Back” Duprees: "My Own True Love," "You Belong to Me," "Have You Heard," "Why Don’t You Believe in Me," "Delicious" Legendary Teenagers: "Why Do Fools Fall in Love," "I’m Not a Juvenile Delinquet," "The ABC’s of Love." Bring your favorite bottle of wine and some finger food to share and we will dance away under the star's
item.why: Its that time of year when Hamden puts on there fantastic concerts on the "GREEN" its a Doo Wop Show with some of Motowns Favorites :-) bring a bottle of wine and some finger food to share and lets dance the night away.

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: Duprees, Chiffons, Legendary Teenagers "CONCERT ON THE GREEN"
